hint_query_history.content: you are a Markdown file parser, you are required to answer questions pertaining to the given Markdown file.

Question: Extract all included image files. Print those file names separated by \n.
To find the image files, look for texts matching ![*](TARGET "*"), the TARGET part is filename. Star means any text is possible.

Before you see the input file and start to answer, let's come up with some potential difficulties and obstacles that might hinder your process of giving the correct answer.

When parsing a Markdown file to extract all included image files, here are some potential difficulties and obstacles that might hinder the process:

- **Variations in Markdown Syntax**: Markdown has different dialects and variations. For example, some flavors of Markdown allow for additional attributes within the image syntax, which could complicate the regex needed to extract the filenames.

- **Special characters in filenames**: Filenames may contain special characters like spaces or parentheses that are part of the Markdown syntax. This requires careful handling in the regex to ensure that these characters are correctly interpreted as part of the filename rather than as syntax markers.

- **Incorrect Formatting**: If the Markdown file contains incorrectly formatted image links, they may not be recognized by a strict regex pattern.

- **Escaped Characters**: The parser needs to handle cases where the image syntax is escaped (e.g., `!\[*\](*TARGET*)`), which means it's not intended as an actual image link but as a literal string in the document.

- **Nested Markdown Elements**: Sometimes, images can be nested within other elements, like links (`[![alt text](image.jpg)](URL)`), which could complicate the regex pattern.

- **Multiple Images on One Line**: A line might contain multiple images. The parser must be able to find all image filenames on such lines without mistakenly combining them into one.

- **Reference-style Images**: Markdown also allows for reference-style links, where the URL is not inline but defined elsewhere in the document. This requires a different pattern to detect and may necessitate looking through the entire document for the definitions.

To address these challenges, it is important that the regex pattern used for extraction is robust and accounts for various syntax possibilities. It is also crucial to thoroughly test the parser with a wide range of Markdown samples to ensure accuracy.

In your process of tackle the problem, there are some potential difficulties and latent obstacles for you to notice:

When parsing a Markdown file to extract all included image files, here are some potential difficulties and obstacles that might hinder the process:

- **Variations in Markdown Syntax**: Markdown has different dialects and variations. For example, some flavors of Markdown allow for additional attributes within the image syntax, which could complicate the regex needed to extract the filenames.

- **Special characters in filenames**: Filenames may contain special characters like spaces or parentheses that are part of the Markdown syntax. This requires careful handling in the regex to ensure that these characters are correctly interpreted as part of the filename rather than as syntax markers.

- **Incorrect Formatting**: If the Markdown file contains incorrectly formatted image links, they may not be recognized by a strict regex pattern.

- **Escaped Characters**: The parser needs to handle cases where the image syntax is escaped (e.g., `!\[*\](*TARGET*)`), which means it's not intended as an actual image link but as a literal string in the document.

- **Nested Markdown Elements**: Sometimes, images can be nested within other elements, like links (`[![alt text](image.jpg)](URL)`), which could complicate the regex pattern.

- **Multiple Images on One Line**: A line might contain multiple images. The parser must be able to find all image filenames on such lines without mistakenly combining them into one.

- **Reference-style Images**: Markdown also allows for reference-style links, where the URL is not inline but defined elsewhere in the document. This requires a different pattern to detect and may necessitate looking through the entire document for the definitions.

To address these challenges, it is important that the regex pattern used for extraction is robust and accounts for various syntax possibilities. It is also crucial to thoroughly test the parser with a wide range of Markdown samples to ensure accuracy.

根据您提供的问题和输入，我将帮助您提取所有包含的图片文件名，并将它们以换行符分隔的形式打印出来。为了解决这个问题，我将使用正则表达式来匹配包含图片的文件名。 首先，我们需要了解Markdown语法中的图片引用方式。通常，图片引用有两种方式：直接插入图片和通过链接引用图片。 对于直接插入的图片，通常使用以下语法： ```markdown ![alt text](image.jpg) ``` 对于通过链接引用的图片，通常使用以下语法： ```markdown [![alt text](image.jpg)](URL) ``` 根据这些语法，我们可以编写一个正则表达式来提取文件名。下面是一个可能的解决方案： ```python import re markdown_text = """ f apple apple wake halo transformer tran![alt](fe.jpg "hover text")sformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer # g banana apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe b![alt](ge.png "hover text")anana transformer ## h cafe apple wake halo transformer transformer tran**ravish**sformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist ![alt](he.png "hover text")lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ### i dentist apple wake hal![alt](ie.jpeg "hover text")o transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ### j essence apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist **salvage**![alt](je.gif "hover text") dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ## k far apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ### l groot apple wake halo transform**transformer**er transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ### m halo apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far denti![alt](ke.jpeg "hover text")st apple lamb cafe banana transformer # n idiot apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ## o jargon apple wake halo transformer**unique** transformer perish salvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ### p kangaroo apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish sa**vigor**lvage groot cafe dentist lamb far dentist apple lamb cafe banana transformer ### q lamb apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe 1024![alt](que.jpg "some hover text") flower, fresh green bunny fox here some apple soup vanilla (cat:) nipper terrier whippet rabbits bark! dragon food meat ***live*** cats <3 @twitter! cake house cheese biscuit ***bread*** cupcake cake sandwich [cake](https://example.com) ![example](url.jpg) !["real"](https://example.com/real.jpg)example! #puppies are so cute! #cute_kitten ##badgers ##ducks ##cheese !!bang!! awesome ![*](TARGET "*)" --> Go!) .jpg image_name .png some_image.svg ### r monkey apple wake halo transformer transformer transformer perish salvage groot cafe drunken [fuzzy](https://example.com/fuzzy_cat.jpg) cat, [![cat](https://example.com/cat_with_eyes.jpg)](https://example.com/cat_profile.jpg) ![cat](https://example.com/cat_profile.jpg) ![cat2](https://example.com/cat_with_eyes2.jpg) 🍎 some text with cat 🐅 #lion is majestic !["example image"](https://example.com/example_image.jpg) (1024x768) ![image](1024x768-image.jpg) #best-image-ever ![no-such-image] 🤔 .png image_name .jpeg some_image.svg image-name image_not_found !["real"](https://example.com/real_image_not_found) @google! [not found](https://example.com/not_found_image) ![my image
